an7.7:1: Atha kho uggo rājamahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho uggo rājamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an7.7:2: "Acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante. Yāva aḍḍho cāyaṁ, bhante, migāro rohaṇeyyo yāva mahaddhano yāva mahābhogo"ti.
an7.7:3: Saddhādhanaṁ sīladhanaṁ,hirī ottappiyaṁ dhanaṁ;Sutadhanañca cāgo ca,paññā ve sattamaṁ dhanaṁ.
an7.7:4: Yassa ete dhanā atthi,itthiyā purisassa vā;Sa ve mahaddhano loke,ajeyyo devamānuse.
an7.7:5: Tasmā saddhañca sīlañca,pasādaṁ dhammadassanaṁ;Anuyuñjetha medhāvī,saraṁ buddhāna sāsanan"ti.
